title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1676/92 of 29 June 1992 fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer prices for apples applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1676/92  of 29 June 1992  fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer prices for apples applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1992/93 marketing year, the Community offer prices for apples (CN codes 0808 10 91, 0808 10 93 and 0808 10 99) applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all  sizes, shall be as follows:
July: 35,70
August: 41,04
September: 42,35
October: 42,58
November: 43,34
December: 45,87
January: 48,27
February: 47,14
March: 49,24
April: 47,37
May: 38,88
June: 38,29.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 363, 13. 12. 1989, p. 3. (2) OJ No L 362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 16. (3) OJ No L 366, 29. 12. 1990, p. 43.
